articles.title: HAVE A LOOK | Photos of a Cold War nuclear missile silo complex for sale for about R5,78m in Kansas - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The Kansas property with a 170-foot-deep decommissioned missile silo, built to launch Atlas-F intercontinental missiles, has a $380,000 price tag.
articles.content:
• A  1961 decommissioned Atlas-F intercontinental ballistic missile silo complex is for sale.
  • The unique Cold War-era relic is part of an 11-acre Kansas lot on the market for R5,78m.
